title: VPN Access Request
description: Request secure remote access to company network
steps: Submit IT-102 VPN Access form through IT Portal
Test connection and report issues if any

title: Annual Leave Request
description: Request annual leave from your manager
steps: Check available leave balance in HR Portal
Select dates and submit leave request online
If approved, HR updates payroll system
Confirmation email sent with approved dates
Ensure handoff of work before leave starts

title: Software License Request
steps: Identify required software with business justification
Submit license request via IT Help Desk
IT installs software on your computer
You receive setup and usage instructions

title: Meeting Room Booking
description: Reserve a meeting room for events
steps: Book room for required date and time
Specify number of attendees and special requests
Arrive 10 minutes early to set up

title: Expense Report Submission
steps: Collect all receipts for business expenses
Create new expense report with project code
Submit report - Finance reviews within SLA

title: Office Access Card Request
description: Get or replace your office access card
steps: Report to Facilities office with ID
Fill out access card request form
Pick up card at Facilities office

title: Hardware Request (Laptop/Monitor)
steps: Submit hardware request with business justification
IT receives and sets up hardware
You receive configured device ready to use
